properties.name: Malborough Volcano
properties.legend: Active volcano. Height: 9925 ft

properties.name: Istamnar Hot Springs
properties.legend: A hot springs area. Average temperature: 120°F

properties.name: Sadhemmacha — iron mining town
properties.legend: Sadhemmacha is a mining town of 16668 people just nearby the iron mine

properties.name: Buutsayan — lead mining town
properties.legend: Buutsayan is a mining town of 20107 people just nearby the lead mine

properties.name: Shimwood Bridge
properties.legend: A stone bridge spans over the Dirtshear River near Shimwood

properties.name: Esireenya Bridge
properties.legend: A stone bridge spans over the Lyllelelthyr Fork near Esireenya

properties.name: Y'atha Bridge
properties.legend: A formidable bridge spans over the Seyridh River near Y'atha

properties.name: Gagd Bridge
properties.legend: A stone bridge spans over the Gagd River near Grigh

properties.name: The Frozen Inn
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside inn. Delicious grilled bear with black kumis is served here

properties.name: The Grey Owl
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious stuffed oranges with ice tequila is served here

properties.name: Deverchwich Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea

properties.name: Khundinarg Waterfall
properties.legend: The cascades of a stunning waterfall

properties.name: Thy'athagga Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Gilmethian Conquest. 
Date: June 28, 1903 Somsa Era

properties.name: Seynin Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Gilmethian Conquest. 
Date: July 22, 1903 Somsa Era

properties.name: Dogithrem Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Itherarith War. 
Date: August 5, 112 Somsa Era

properties.name: Alunalon Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Felranese War. 
Date: February 18, 114 Somsa Era

properties.name: Dungeon
properties.legend: Undiscovered dungeon. See One page dungeon

properties.name: Dungeon
properties.legend: Undiscovered dungeon. See One page dungeon

properties.name: Clifront Monster
properties.legend: Rumors say a relic monster of 6 ft long inhabits Clifront Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake

properties.name: Duntefnal Monster
properties.legend: Old sailors tell stories of a gigantic sea monster inhabiting these dangerous waters. Rumors say it can be 21 ft long

properties.name: Wethil Beast
properties.legend: Legends speak of a horrifying Beast who inhabits Wethil hills and terrorizes the region

properties.name: Kizirek Forest
properties.legend: A sacred forest of Rake (Drakonic) culture

properties.name: Thalas Forest
properties.legend: A sacred forest of Quenian (Elfish) culture

properties.name: Izgatvince Forest
properties.legend: A sacred forest of Rohand (Human) culture

properties.name: Myranzan Forest
properties.legend: A sacred forest of Lothian (Dark Elfish) culture

properties.name: Hluiralhei Pinery
properties.legend: A sacred pinery of Eldar (Elfish) culture

properties.name: Vhaltheas Bisons
properties.legend: A gang of forest highwaymen

properties.name: Keathei Jackals
properties.legend: A gang of forest highwaymen

properties.name: Pirates
properties.legend: Pirate ships have been spotted in these waters

properties.name: Aidurth Statue
properties.legend:
An ancient statue. It has an inscription, but no one can translate it:
ⳂⳐⳐ⳥⳩ⳠⲺⳀⲺⳐⲲⳃⳎⳎⳎⳀⳄⳂⲾⳈⳈ⳩Ⳝ⳧ⳬⳀⳭⳒ ⳲⳌⳄⳆⳎⳔⳁⳎⳚⲼⳭⳢⳐⳀⳀ⳾ⳁ⳩ ⳊⳒⳂⳔⲸⳖⲺⳠ ⳬⳭ ⲺⲾⳭⲼ⳹ⳬⳚ⳩⳪ⳠⲼⳔⳂⲺⳤⳄ Ⳇ ⳬⳠⳀⲾⲲⲺⲲⲼⳢⲺⳤⳤ⳥ⳐⳘ

properties.name: Fillulemarso Pillar
properties.legend:
An ancient pillar. It has an inscription, but no one can translate it:
Ⳛ ⳆⳆⳞⳭⳚⳲⳂⳭⳖⳤⳒⳖⳊⲶⳊⲲⲸⲼⳫⲲⳊⳌⳌ⳩ⲺⳜⳊⳈⳂ⳩ⳂⲶ⳧⳥ⳒⳲⳁⲸ⳥ⲴⳚⳘⳢⳞⲶⳈⳫ⳹ⳚⳚⳒⳆ ⳭⳲⳫⳢⳒⳜⲺ⳾⳩⳩

properties.name: Flavebonf Pillar
properties.legend:
An ancient pillar. It has an inscription, but no one can translate it:
ⳬⳁⳜ⳩ⳌⳌ ⳤⳔⲶⳈⲺⳒ ⳤ⳹ⳔⲴⲼⳠⳀⳈⳬⳫⳃ⳧ⳃ⳾Ⳣ⳧ⳖⲺⳘⳫⳞⳀⳌⳌⳜ⳹ⳊⳢⳚⳈⲶⳲⳒⲶⳀⳂⳭ⳹Ⲹ ⳒⳘⲺ Ⲿ

properties.name: Ruined Mausoleum
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient mausoleum. Untold riches may lie within

properties.name: Ruined Sacred site
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient sacred site. Untold riches may lie within

properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient outpost. Untold riches may lie within

properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient stronghold. Untold riches may lie within

properties.name: Travelling Wonderous Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this wonderous circus is here for a limited time only

properties.name: Travelling Extraordinary Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this extraordinary circus is here for a limited time only

properties.name: Drynd Joust
properties.legend: Warriors from around the land gather for a joust of cunning in Drynd, with fame, fortune and favour on offer to the victor

properties.name: Minor Jetty
properties.legend: A small location along the Anavethelian Fork to launch boats from sits here, along with a weary looking owner, willing to sell passage along the river

properties.name: Geese migration
properties.legend: A huge group of geese are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary

properties.name: Rhouzakkol jamboree
properties.legend: A jamboree has been organised at Rhouzakkol as a chance to gather the foreign dignitaries of the area together to be merry, make alliances and scheme around the crisis

properties.name: Pondge festival
properties.legend: A festival has been organised at Pondge as a chance to gather the local elders of the area together to be merry, make alliances and scheme around the crisis

properties.name: Narbabilbu Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine

properties.name: Abyssal Rift
properties.legend: A rumoured abyssal rift in this area is causing all known nearby beings to flee in terror.
